2.title: Konichiwa, Chloe
2.plot: Chloe, Danny & Carys become camp counselors and help a new camper fit in.

18.title: Samba Success
18.plot: Chloe and friends help a Pretty Parrot regain her confidence so she can fly.

22.title: A Princess Party
22.plot: Chloe and friends awaken a sleeping princess and keep her awake so that she can attend her ball.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Stuffed owl Hootie Hoo keeps bumping his head. Chloe and her friends visit outer space to dust the stars so Hootie Hoo can see better at night.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Chloe and friends don raingear to play in the rain and soon discover the rainbow is missing. Together they must find the seven colors and return them to the sky.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Chloe and friends help a band of pirates sort their treasure. They also help them learn that "treasure" should be used and enjoyed, not buried!

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: The kids visit a Queendom where all the pink paint has been destroyed by a dragon. The kids are able to mix up their own pink paint using white and red.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Jet doesn't know what to do for the "show" that Chloe is staging. But a jungle cruise, a group of monkeys, and a mischievous snake show Jet that he can dance!

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: The kids visit a land of ice and snow where they discover Mr. Cloud has lost his snowflake-cutter so the snow is dropping in big blobs instead of delicate flakes.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Chloe and friends must navigate a fantastical race course by following the directional words on a map.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Chloe and her friends dress up as deep sea divers and travel under the sea... where they help an octopus appreciate the benefits of having eight arms.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Chloe and friends visit the mountains of Bavaria to help "Mr. Echo" understand the idea of sequencing to help him repeat back sounds in the right order.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Chloe and friends visit a fairy land that is always light. It turns out the Sun has lost her "comfort blankie" and can't sleep without it.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: The kids travel to the desert of Arabia where they meet a lost camel. With the help of some low crocodiles and a high Sphinx, they lead him safely home.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: A frustrated train can't pull his heavy load up a steep hill. The kids show him that, by splitting the load into two parts, he can make it light enough to pull up the hill.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Chloe and friends become animal doctors and treat everyone from the smallest mouse to the biggest dinosaur.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Chloe and friends go for a scavenger hunt in the jungle - with a new friend who is new to the jungle as well. But they're not sure whether a coconut is found at the top of a tree or the bottom...

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: The kids travel undersea as mermaids and find all the fish travel in pairs. When they come upon one who is alone, they set out to find her perfect match.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Chloe and friends encounter a "King Kong" type gorilla who is wreaking havoc because he has the hiccups.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: An adventure takes Jet and Chloe to a Native American village where they play 'snap' to help create a pretty Totem Pole.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: The kids help a Chef make a cake for his son's birthday - and make rocking musical instruments in the process!

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Lil can't remember the correct sequence for the steps of her dance. A music box ballerina helps her decipher the repeated pattern of the steps.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: When the new Ring Master's assistant accidentally mixes all the circus acts props up, it's up to Chloe to sort it out and save the special children's performance!

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: The kids have fun making things grow with water but when they overgrow a mouse, she's too tall to get inside her home and reach her babies. They enlist Mac who's short enough to help.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Dressed as Cave Kids, Chloe and Jet travel to Dino Land. Whilst there, with the help of some rolling fruit, they help their new friend Dino find his missing Dino egg.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Chloe and her friends are thrilled to meet the Tooth Fairy - but she's lost her bag of rewards! Now they only have one night to find it before the children of the world wake up!

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: The kids paint pictures that come to life, but forget to give their stick-man the ten fingers he needs to hold the handlebars so he can join them on a bike ride.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Chloe and Jet go to Jack and the Beanstalk land and, with the help of the woodcutter, help the Giant get a good night's sleep.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: The kids travel to the Mayan Ruins to meet a toucan with a problem. With the help of a cheeky monkey, they solve the puzzle and save the day.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Scout, the St. Bernard puppy, is good at finding things. But he can't find his way home! Chloe and friends find the perfect solution with the help of a few pine cones.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: A river that runs through the forest has dried up, leaving the forest animals high and dry. Chloe and friends must solve the mystery of the dry river.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: Handyman Chloe and friends are called to fix Mother Nature's run-down cottage.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Chloe and Tara help a wizard regain his magical powers.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot: The Winter Wonderland celebration comes to a grinding halt when the Royal Chef bakes the biggest cake ever - but can't get it out of his bakery.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot: Chloe and her pals have to deliver a new magic lamp to Mrs. Genie, but they accidentally use up its three wishes!

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Chloe and Tara help out a slightly befuddled Owl to ensure that story time in the Forest is never cancelled again.

34.title: Episode #1.34
34.plot: Chloe and Jet cheer up Tess, an unhappy giant tortoise on an island in the Seychelles, by getting her to play a 'fruitful' game of soccer with them.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: Chloe and her friends explore all the elements of being a fire fighters - and even put out a fire in their own backyard!

36.title: Episode #1.36
36.plot: Chloe and friends help a horse learn the joy of succeeding on your own, without the help of "magic" shoes.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: When Chloe, Carrot and Jet are left in charge of a vegetable garden they have to keep a flock of troublesome birds from eating all the vegetables!

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: Chloe and friends help out a couple of penguins who are playing a very strange game of football!

39.title: Episode #1.39
39.plot: Someone is taking fruit from the fruit shop overnight - Chloe the Private Detective finds the surprising culprit!

40.title: Episode #1.40
40.plot: The kids become cowhands, moving a herd of cows across the open range.

41.title: Episode #1.41
41.plot: No one has any milk for their breakfast because the farmer is still asleep. Chloe and friends discover that Mr. Cock-a-doodle-doo has overslept because he forgot to wind his alarm.

42.title: Episode #1.42
42.plot: The kids help an inventor discover the joy of a simple toy.

43.title: Episode #1.43
43.plot: When a little birdie boards the plane, he's very nervous. Together, Tara, Chloe and Carrot help the little bird overcome his fear of flying.

44.title: Episode #1.44
44.plot: Chloe and her pals have to help a trainee wizard pass her broomstick driving test - which is going to be difficult as she can't tell left from right!

45.title: Episode #1.45
45.plot: Chloe and the kids have to look after a flock of mischievous sheep who keep escaping!

46.title: Episode #1.46
46.plot: Chloe and her pals take on the unbeaten volleyball champions - but she finds a new friend who's a secret weapon!

47.title: Episode #1.47
47.plot: Chloe & friends help Oscar the Octopus discover his musical talent

48.title: Episode #1.48
48.plot: The kids travel to Square Town where the inhabitants have a problem. Local Superhero Square Man has turned everything square. Chloe persuades him that things are better when they are the correct shape.

49.title: Episode #1.49
49.plot: The girls step in when a flamenco dancing flamingo hurts her leg.

50.title: Episode #1.50
50.plot: Lil and Mac join Chloe as doctors and nurses to help fix broken toys. In the process, they discover that being different can be fun!

51.title: Episode #1.51
51.plot: Chloe and Carrot fill in for a missing magician - but when they start having trouble with their props, they don't realize that their act is being sabotaged!

52.title: Episode #1.52
52.plot: Chloe and Jet start out as a pop star duo but find out that the more the merrier when it comes to having fun!

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: Chloe, Tara, and Jet are going to a big movie premiere but discover that Chloe's gorilla co-star is too self-conscious about her size to attend with them

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Chloe, Riley, and new friend Carys help a T-Rex who wants to play baseball with the other animals in the zoo.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: The Great Pyramid is missing and Chloe and friends, with a little help from some local Egyptian animals, must locate it.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Chloe, Riley, and Jet help a strange 'Bounsie McBirdal' mama bird find her lost egg.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Chloe, Riley and Danny help a giant parade balloon to float so it can be in the parade.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Chloe and friends awaken a sleeping princess and keep her awake so that she can attend her ball.

7.title: To Bee or Not To Bee
7.plot: Chloe, Carys and Tara travel to a land of flowers to help a Little Bee be happy doing little things.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Chloe and friends encounter a "scary monster" while camping, but he turns out to be a very small, very loud bullfrog!

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: It's a very special day in Serengeti: Master and Miss Giraffe are getting married. Chloe and her friends join in and help make it a very special day for another one of Serengeti's animals.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Chloe and Lil' help "Mr. Machine" (a nervous tennis ball machine) unclog a jam so they can play tennis.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: The kids help a chef learn how to sort peppers so her soup isn't so spicy hot.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: Chloe and Jet help Granny find the Big Friendly Wolf who is reluctant to ask for help collecting berries for the lunch he always shares with Granny.

14.title: Episode #2.14
14.plot: Chloe and friends visit a storybook kingdom where dancing is forbidden because of a wheelchair-bound monarch.

15.title: Clock a Doodle Doo
15.plot: Chloe heads to the farm to wake up Mr. Cock-a-doodle-doo as he has overslept and no-one has any milk for their breakfast.

16.title: Episode #2.16
16.plot: Chloe and her friends become mermaids and befriend a variety of sea creatures. When a big storm displaces their new friends, Chloe and the gang must sort the fish to get them back to their natural habitats.

17.title: Episode #2.17
17.plot: Chloe and friends help a height-challenged penguin who is not tall enough to ride a roller coaster.

18.title: Episode #2.18
18.plot: Chloe and Jet meet a dragon who can't remember what the different kinds of fruit look like.

19.title: Seeing Is Believing
19.plot: Chloe helps a far-sighted spider improve her vision so she can play games with her friends.

20.title: Episode #2.20
20.plot: Chloe, Riley and Jet try to follow a map... to a hidden treasure!

21.title: Episode #2.21
21.plot: Chloe, Riley and Carys help a mother turtle to find her newly hatched babies.

22.title: Episode #2.22
22.plot: The Super Friends must save a carnival from a destructive pair of giant lobsters but Riley can't seem to get used to his new, sticky powers.

23.title: Episode #2.23
23.plot: When Chloe and her friends visit a horse ranch Tara decides to give a horse a makeover before the big rodeo. The horse may look pretty, but she's more comfortable being herself.

24.title: Episode #2.24
24.plot: Chloe and friends must help a group of Hedgehogs communicate with a Giant, and get him to stop ruining their fun.

25.title: Episode #2.25
25.plot: Chloe, Lil' and Mac travel to an Indian Jungle where they help Miss Elephant learn how to play gentler with her smaller friends.

26.title: Episode #2.26
26.plot: In storybook land, Chloe and Jet help the 3 Little Pigs build a house so they can host a birthday party.

27.title: Episode #2.27
27.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

28.title: Episode #2.28
28.plot: The gang helps a young leprechaun learn a magic dance that will turn his pot to gold.

29.title: Episode #2.29
29.plot: Chloe, Jet and Tara help convince a worried Pegasus to stay still so an artist can carve a statue of it.

30.title: Episode #2.30
30.plot: Chloe and Jet help Mr. Bat clean up his cave-store so they can help Mr. Mammoth finish his invention - a catapult.

31.title: Episode #2.31
31.plot: There's trouble in Fairyland when the official Fairy Duster falls ill and all of the magic dust is depleted. Chloe, Danny and Tara must resupply the magical ingredient!

32.title: Episode #2.32
32.plot: Chloe, Riley and Tara help a flightless bird do what it always wanted to do... herd cattle.

33.title: Episode #2.33
33.plot: Acrobats Chloe, Tara, Danny and Carys must help the performers doing a show at a local "watering hole" learn to get along.

34.title: Episode #2.34
34.plot: Chloe and friends meet a sable who can't wait to see the lovely Northern Lights. Chloe and Jet help him pass the time and their patience is rewarded with an amazing light show!

35.title: Episode #2.35
35.plot: Chloe and Carys help prepare Tortoise for a roller skating race against Hare.

36.title: Episode #2.36
36.plot: Chloe and her friends travel to Holland to watch the tulips bloom but a grumpy gnome has cast a spell to block the sun!

37.title: Episode #2.37
37.plot: Chloe and friends travel to China and help a pair of pandas figure out why a little dragon keeps taking their table tennis balls.

38.title: Episode #2.38
38.plot: Partygoers Chloe, Riley and Carys must help a behind-schedule giraffe prepare for his big costume party.

39.title: Episode #2.39
39.plot: Chloe, Jet and Tara meet a shy Nisse with a special talent.

40.title: Episode #2.40
40.plot: Chloe, Tara, and Carys help a caterpillar find a lost friend who has turned into a butterfly.

41.title: Episode #2.41
41.plot: Chloe helps a sea monster realize his dream of singing with mermaids.

42.title: Episode #2.42
42.plot: When Chloe and her friends become a popular singing group, Jet learns that sometimes you need to ask for help.

43.title: Episode #2.43
43.plot:
Know what this is about?

44.title: Episode #2.44
44.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

45.title: Episode #2.45
45.plot: Chloe, Danny and Jet go to Scotland where they use their vet skills to help local animals, including reluctant Sinnie the Sea Serpent of the Loch, who has a boo-boo on her tail!

46.title: Episode #2.46
46.plot: When Chloe and her friends become gardeners Tara learns a lesson in patience when she tries to use magic to make sunflowers grow faster - with disastrous results!

47.title: Episode #2.47
47.plot: Wildlife photographers Chloe and Jet take pictures of rare animals for a wildlife magazine.

48.title: Episode #2.48
48.plot: Chloe and Jet problem solve to help Little Train make his deliveries on time.

49.title: Episode #2.49
49.plot: Chloe, Danny & Carys become camp counselors and help a new camper fit in.

50.title: Episode #2.50
50.plot:
Know what this is about?

51.title: Episode #2.51
51.plot: Clowns Chloe, Carys and Jet perform at the opening of a new playground, but end up having to watch the kids when the babysitter gets a stomachache.

52.title: Episode #2.52
52.plot:
Know what this is about?

1.title: Pizza Party
1.plot: When a frazzled restaurant owner/chef oversleeps, Chloe, Danny, Jet and Lovely Carrot must somehow appease her important guests - an Ostrich Mayor and her husband.

-1.title: Twinkle Twinkle Missing Star
-1.plot: Chloe helps a lion constellation find the fallen star that was once his tail.

imdb.title: Chloe's Closet

production companies.name: MEDIA Programme of the European Union

plot: An animated children's program about a little girl, her security blanket, and the adventures she has wile playing dress up in her closet.::IMDb Editors
